sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) The character may spend one Destiny Point to ignore the effects of ongoing Critical Injuries on any Intellect- or Cunning-related checks until the end of the encounter. He still suffers from the injury itself.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Mental fortress</name> <number>TAL0001082</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 04:03:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>39e26870db624c542901de90cf9619fe</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 04:03:44</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
